sentence: Pennsylvanias GOP gubernatorial primary Pennsylvania Republicans appeared poised to nominate state Sen. Doug Mastriano on Tuesday to take on Democrat Josh Shapiro in the November general election, stirring concern among some GOP officials who fear that Mastriano may prove unelectable.
author: Max Greenwood
title: Seven primary races to watch on Tuesday

sentence: Those efforts culminated in 2020 election denier and January 6 rally attendee state Sen. Doug Mastriano with Trump's backing, easily securing the Republican nomination for governor.
author: Grace Panetta
title: Pennsylvania's Republican Senate primary is likely headed for a recount with Trump adding to the chaos

sentence: Trump boasted another win with the victory of state Sen. Doug Mastriano, an additional endorsement that roiled some Pennsylvania Republicans due to the candidate's extreme views.
author: Grace Panetta
title: Trump may stop endorsing candidates for competitive GOP primaries, report says: 'This is not how he expected this to go'

sentence: In the gubernatorial primary, the Trump-backed far-right candidate Doug Mastriano was able to drub his opponents and win 44% of the vote in a 3-way race, even in the face of staunch opposition from the Republican establishment.
author: Douglas Schoen
title: Schoen: It's still Donald Trump's Republican party

sentence: And in Pennsylvania last week, Doug Mastriano, the far-right election denier Trump endorsed, won the gubernatorial primary.
title: 'No one's paying any attention': The week that Republicans ignored Trump's election lies
